title: Devil's Creek
description: When Erika Marsh suffers a car breakdown in a tiny logging town in northern Wisconsin, she witnesses the heavy pall of legend and superstition that blankets the citizens. The older residents tell of a night seventy years ago, when the Angel of Death paid a visit and took away an innocent soul -- just as he always has, every seventy years.Tonight is the seventieth anniversary of the Angel's last visit, to the day.In the midst of a violent storm, cut off from the rest of the world, Erika watches a terrifying legend unfold around her.
author: Paul Maitrejean
